MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Milton of Campsie, affecting properties in Valleyfield and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.12pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Fingarry substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.05pm on the 3rd of December 2020.
